```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(here)
library(janitor)

```

```{r}
mode_emissions <- read_csv(here("data", "raw", "mode_emissions_cook.csv")) %>% 
  clean_names()

```

```{r}

all_fugitive <- mode_emissions %>% 
  filter(emission_points_description == "Fugitive emissions") %>% 
  filter(yr %in% c("2015", "2016", "2017"))

```

```{r}
koppers <- mode_emissions %>% 
  group_by(pollutant_code) %>% 
  summarize(total = sum(tons_per_year))
 
  
```

```{r}
koppers_naphthalene <- mode_emissions %>% 
  filter(name == "Koppers Inc") %>% 
  filter(pollutant_code == "91203") %>% 
  group_by(yr, emission_points_description) %>% 
  summarize(total = sum(tons_per_year))
 
```


```{r}
koppers_benzene <- mode_emissions %>% 
  filter(name == "Koppers Inc") %>% 
  filter(pollutant_code == "BENZENE") %>% 
  group_by(yr) %>% 
  summarize(total = sum(tons_per_year))

```
